steps: Click on the 'Insert' tab in the ribbon.
In the 'Header & Footer' section, click on 'Header'.
Choose a header style from the available options or click on 'Edit Header' to create a custom header.
Enter the desired content for the header, such as text, images, or page numbers.
Customize the header by adjusting the font, size, alignment, and other formatting options.
Click outside the header area to apply the changes to the document.
Save the document to preserve the header for future use.
